chapter.text: Hodyna prybula blyzhcha, ta misyatsʹ rozkolovsya
Todi vony pobachyly chudo; ale vony prohnaly ta skazaly, "Stare zacharuvannya
Vony disbelieved, proslidkuvaly za yikhnimy dumkamy, ta dotrymuvalysʹ yikhnikh starykh tradytsiy
Dostatni poperedzhennya buly dostavleni do pylʹnykh yim
Velykyy wisdom; ale vsi poperedzhennya marno
Ihnoruyutʹ yikh; denʹ prybude koly caller oholosytʹ strashne lykho
Z yikhnimy ochamy prynyzheni, vony vytikayutʹ z graves lyublyatʹ rozihnani saranu
Tomu shcho vony vidpovidayutʹ do caller, disbelievers skazhutʹ, "Tse ye tyazhkyy denʹ
lyudy Noah disbelieved pered tym, yak yim. Vony disbelieved nash sluzhbovetsʹ ta skazav, "Bozhevilʹnyy!" Vin peresliduvavsya
Vin blahav yoho Lorda, "ya pryhnichuyusʹ; harantuyte meni peremoha
My todi vidkryly bramy neba, l'yuchy vodu
Ta my vyklykaly pruzhyny khlynuty z zemli. Vody zustriti do efektu predetermined rishennya
My perevezly yoho na watercraft zroblenyy kolod ta kanativ
Tse pobihlo pid nashymy watchful ochamy; vynahoroda dlya odnoho khto buv vidkynutyy
My vstanovyly tse yak urok. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Yak strashnyy Miy retribution pislya poperedzhenʹ
My zrobyly Quran lehkyy dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
aad disbelieved. Otzhe, yak strashnyy Miy retribution pislya poperedzhenʹ
My poslaly na nykh nasylʹnytsʹki viter, na dni bezperervnoho neshchastya
Tse shpuryalo lyudey navkolo tak, yakby vony decayed korpusy dereva palʹmy
Yak strashnyy Miy retribution pislya poperedzhenʹ
My zrobyly Quran lehkyy dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Thamoud vidkhylyv poperedzhennya
Vony skazaly, "Budutʹ my slidkuyemo odni z nas; lyudsʹkyy? My todi zablukayemosʹ, todi zakinchuyemosʹ u Pekli
povidomlennya prybulo vnyz yomu, zamistʹ nas? Vin ye ochevydnyy brekhun
Vony znaydutʹ zavtra khto ochevydnyy brekhun
My posylayemo verblyudu yak test dlya nykh. Sposterihayte yikh ta patsiyent
Informuyutʹ yikh shcho voda povynna buty rozdilena sered nykh; (verblyud) povynen buty dozvolenyy shchob vypyty na yiy pryznachenyy denʹ
Ale vony perekonaly yikhnʹoho tovarysha ubyty (verblyud), ta vin zobov'yazanyy
Otzhe, yak strashnyy Miy retribution! Vony buly poperedzheni
My poslaly na nykh odyn udar, whereupon vony staly lyublyatʹ zibrane urozhay sino
My zrobyly Quran lehkyy dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
lyudy Doli vidkhylyly poperedzhennya
My showered yim z skelyamy. Tilʹky rodyna Doli bula vryatovana u svitanku
My blahoslovyly yoho ta yoho rodynu; my takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo appreciative
Vin poperedyv yikh pro nash requital, ale vony ridiculed poperedzhennya
Vony vely perehovory z nym pro yoho hosti; my blinded yim. Zaznayte Moho retribution; vy buly poperedzheni
Rano nastupne ranok, spustoshlyvyy retribution vrazyty yikh
Zaznayutʹ Moho retribution; vy buly poperedzheni
My zrobyly Quran lehki dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Pharaoh lyudy buly poperedzheni
Vony vidkhylyly vsi nashi znaky. Otzhe, my requited yim yak Mohutniy, Omnipotent musytʹ
vashi disbelievers krashche nizh disbelievers? Vy uvilʹnyuvalysʹ svyatym pysannyam
Mozhlyvo vony dumayutʹ, "My budemo peremozhtsi
Usi budutʹ zavdavatysya porazky; vony povernutʹsya navkolo ta tikayutʹ
Hodyna ochikuye yikh, ta Hodyna ye daleko hirsha ta bilʹshe bolisnyy
Zvychayno, vynuvatyy astray, ta zakinchatʹsya u Pekli
Vony budutʹ tyahnutysya u hellfire, forcibly. Zaznayte ahoniyi retribution
Vse utvorene my akuratno obmiryuyetʹsya
Nashi komandy roblyatʹsya v mezhakh blymayutʹ oka
My vynyshchyly vashykh kolehy. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Vse vony zapysuyetʹsya u svyatykh pysanni
Vse, male abo velyke, zapysuyetʹsya
Bezsumnivno, spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly park ta richky
U zmozi chesti, u Omnipotent Koroli
